chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Set) (P : Pred A) (xs bs cs : list A), ExistsL A P (xs ++ bs) -> ExistsL A P (xs ++ cs ++ bs)

Premises:
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D {TA TX AA AF
ExistsL : forall A : Set, Pred A -> list A -> Set
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Pred = fun A : Set => A -> Prop : Set -> Type Arguments Pred _%type_scope
monExistsL1 : forall (A : Set) (P : Pred A) (xs bs : list A), ExistsL A P bs -> ExistsL A P (xs ++ bs)
SearchE : forall (A : Set) (P : Pred A) (a : A) (l : list A), ExistsL A P l -> ExistsL A P (a :: l)
FoundE : forall (A : Set) (P : Pred A) (a : A) (l : list A), P a -> ExistsL A P (a :: l)
ExistsL_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : Pred A) (P0 : forall l : list A, ExistsL A P l -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (p : P a), P0 (a :: l) (FoundE A P a l p)) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A P l), P0 l e -> P0 (a :: l) (SearchE A P a l e)) -> forall (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A P l), P0 l e
ExistsL_rec : forall (A : Set) (P : Pred A) (P0 : forall l : list A, ExistsL A P l -> Set), (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (p : P a), P0 (a :: l) (FoundE A P a l p)) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A P l), P0 l e -> P0 (a :: l) (SearchE A P a l e)) -> forall (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A P l), P0 l e
ExistsL_sind : forall (A : Set) (P : Pred A) (P0 : forall l : list A, ExistsL A P l -> SProp), (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (p : P a), P0 (a :: l) (FoundE A P a l p)) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A P l), P0 l e -> P0 (a :: l) (SearchE A P a l e)) -> forall (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A P l), P0 l e
ExistsL_rect : forall (A : Set) (P : Pred A) (P0 : forall l : list A, ExistsL A P l -> Type), (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (p : P a), P0 (a :: l) (FoundE A P a l p)) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A P l), P0 l e -> P0 (a :: l) (SearchE A P a l e)) -> forall (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A P l), P0 l e
Relation_Operators.Desc_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall x : A, P (x :: nil)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> P (l ++ y :: nil) -> P ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA l -> P l
Relation_Operators.Desc_ind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall x : A, P (x :: nil)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> P (l ++ y :: nil) -> P ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA l -> P l
rev_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (l ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, P l
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, P l
list_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Type), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, P l
list_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Set), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, P l
rev_list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P (rev l) -> P (rev (a :: l))) -> forall l : list A, P (rev l)
Add_ind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
existT : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Type) (x : A), P x -> {x : A & P x}
exist : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A), P x -> {x : A | P x}
Relation_Operators.d_conc : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)
Inductive sig (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : Type := exist : forall x : A, P x -> {x : A | P x} Arguments sig [A]%type_scope _%type_scope Arguments exist [A]%type_scope _%function_scope
Inductive sigT (A : Type) (P : A -> Type) : Type := existT : forall x : A, P x -> {x : A & P x} Arguments sigT [A]%type_scope _%type_scope Arguments existT [A]%type_scope _%function_scope
Inductive Desc (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := d_nil : Relation_Operators.Desc A leA nil | d_one : forall x : A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (x :: nil) | d_conc : forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil) Arguments Relation_Operators.Desc _%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.d_nil _%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.d_one _%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.d_conc _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _ _%list_scope
Forall2_app : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A) (l1' l2' : list B), Forall2 R l1 l1' -> Forall2 R l2 l2' -> Forall2 R (l1 ++ l2) (l1' ++ l2')
fold_left_app : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B -> A) (l l' : list B) (i : A), fold_left f (l ++ l') i = fold_left f l' (fold_left f l i)
exists_last : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), l <> nil -> {l' : list A & {a : A | l = l' ++ a :: nil}}
nat_ind : forall P : nat -> Prop, P 0 -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
filter_app : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l l' : list A), filter f (l ++ l') = filter f l ++ filter f l'
Forall2_app_inv_l : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A) (l' : list B), Forall2 R (l1 ++ l2) l' -> exists l1' l2' : list B, Forall2 R l1 l1' /\ Forall2 R l2 l2' /\ l' = l1' ++ l2'
map_app : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l l' : list A), map f (l ++ l') = map f l ++ map f l'
Forall2_app_inv_r : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (l1' l2' : list B) (l : list A), Forall2 R l (l1' ++ l2') -> exists l1 l2 : list A, Forall2 R l1 l1' /\ Forall2 R l2 l2' /\ l = l1 ++ l2
NoDup_remove_1 : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (a : A), NoDup (l ++ a :: l') -> NoDup (l ++ l')
